name: My First Website
description: The first website I built with HTML,CSS and JS. It is my personal website to introduce myself.

name: Address Book
description: A single page web application for saving and viewing contacts. Contacts are saved in the user's local storage. Practiced TDD using Cypress.

name: Library
description: A backend program built with Ruby. It allows users to borrow and return books from a virtual library. The data of books a library has is stored in a YAML file. Practiced TDD using RSpec.
